name: sbr-generator
description: Spring Boot Rest Generator is a  python Library used to generate source code modules starting from config files . The Generated source code is a CRUD Rest Spring Boot Server.

scripts.buildtest-FullBuildNoTests: npm run buildExampleFullNoTests && cd buildExampleFullNoTests && mvn -X clean package install -Dmaven.test.skip=true
scripts.buildtest-MinBuildNoTests: npm run buildExampleMinNoTests && cd buildExampleMinNoTests && mvn  -X clean package install -Dmaven.test.skip=true
scripts.buildtest-MinBuildAndDoTests: npm run buildExampleMin && cd buildExampleMin && mvn -X clean test
scripts.buildtest-FullBuildAndDoTests: npm run buildExampleFull && cd buildExampleFull && mvn -X clean test
scripts.dev: npm run buildTemplates && npm run buildExampleFull

author: Mohamed Azzouni <mohamed.azzouni@gmail.com>
